live_updates: Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
59278.summary: Some customers in the Capitol Hill area of Burnaby are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
59278.title: Mar 21 - Burnaby (Capitol Hill) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience. A further update will be provided at 17:15 PT.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
